name: Granny's Cellar
description:
During a family meal at his grandparent's house, the child is asked to get a bottle of wine from the cellar. With a dusty Walkman as his only source of courage, he will face his worst nightmares.

Controls Keyboard

Move: A, D

Play Tape: E  or F

Rewind Tape: Shift or R (Hold)

Jump: Spacebar

Gamepad

Move: Left stick

Play Tape: RB or B

Rewind Tape: RT or X (Hold)

Jump: A

Credits 

Game / Level Design: Esteban Legrand

Art: Ibtissam Aqil, Maëlle Peretou

Technical Art: Etienne103 (NSA)

Programmation: Bastien Citarella, Hans Wannop, Maximilien Moussalli

Sound/Musical Design: Point de Sauvegarde AKA Save Point

Used Assets

FXs:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-remaster-4010

Sound FX made by ourselves and a mix of : 

  •  Phil Spectrum Unity Asset Store : SFX Bundle Collection 
  • Potion Audio, Cartoon FX Remaster
  • Jean Moreno freesound.org library : Emanuele_Correani, TobiasLudwig, acclivity, Benboncan
developers: Point de Sauvegarde AKA Save Point
